words.example: The beauty of cherry blossoms is ephemeral, lasting only a few days.

words.meaning: 无处不在的，普遍存在的
words.example: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society.

words.meaning: 意外发现美好事物的能力
words.example: Finding my dream job was pure serendipity.
We need a pragmatic approach to solve this problem.
Her eloquent speech moved the entire audience.
